credit|core_record|coreregistry: A VARCHAR(20) primary key uniquely identifying each core record (e.g., 'CRD001234').
credit|core_record|timemark: A TIMESTAMP(6) indicating when the record was created (e.g., '2025-02-19 14:23:15.123456').
credit|core_record|clientref: A VARCHAR(20) referencing the customer ID (e.g., 'CUST00987').
credit|core_record|appref: A VARCHAR(20) referencing the application ID (e.g., 'APP001122').
credit|core_record|modelline: A VARCHAR(10) storing the model or version reference (e.g., '1.2').
credit|core_record|scoredate: A DATE capturing when scoring took place (e.g., '2025-02-19').
credit|core_record|nextcheck: A DATE noting the next review date (e.g., '2026-02-19').
credit|core_record|confscore: A NUMERIC(5,3) indicating confidence in the model’s output (e.g., '0.835').
credit|core_record|overridestat: An enum (OverrideStatus_enum) describing override status (Policy, Manual).
credit|core_record|overridenote: An enum (OverrideReason_enum) capturing why an override occurred (Policy Exception, Management Decision).
credit|core_record|decidestat: An enum (DecisionStatus_enum) storing the final decision (Pending, Rejected, Approved).
credit|core_record|decidedate: A DATE recording when the final decision was made (e.g., '2025-02-19').
credit|core_record|agespan: A SMALLINT for the customer’s age in years (e.g., '35').
credit|core_record|maritalform: An enum (MaritalStatus_enum) capturing marital status (Single, Married, Widowed, Divorced).
credit|core_record|depcount: A SMALLINT counting how many dependents (e.g., '2').
credit|core_record|resdform: An enum (ResidentialStatus_enum) describing residency (Temporary, Permanent, Foreign).
credit|core_record|phonestab: A SMALLINT for phone number stability (e.g., '3').
credit|core_record|emailstab: A VARCHAR(50) capturing email stability or validation result (e.g., 'Valid12m').
credit|core_record|clientseg: An enum (CustomerSegment_enum) labeling the customer segment (Premium, Standard, Basic).
credit|core_record|tenureyrs: A SMALLINT for how many years the customer has been with the institution (e.g., '4').
credit|core_record|crossratio: A NUMERIC(4,3) ratio measuring cross-sell opportunities (e.g., '0.275').
credit|core_record|churnrate: A NUMERIC(4,3) risk of customer churn (e.g., '0.220').
credit|employment_and_income|emplcoreref: A VARCHAR(20) primary key referencing core_record(CoreRegistry).
credit|employment_and_income|emplstat: An enum (EmploymentStatus_enum) for employment status (Self-employed, Employed, Unemployed, Retired).
credit|employment_and_income|empllen: A SMALLINT indicating length of employment in years (e.g., '5').
credit|employment_and_income|joblabel: An enum (JobTitle_enum) labeling the job (Manager, Teacher, Doctor, Other, Engineer).
credit|employment_and_income|indsector: An enum (IndustrySector_enum) naming the sector (Education, Technology, Healthcare, Finance, Other).
credit|employment_and_income|employerref: A TEXT field storing the employer name (e.g., 'ABC Corp').
credit|employment_and_income|annlincome: A DECIMAL(12,2) capturing annual income in currency units (e.g., '65000.00').
credit|employment_and_income|incverify: An enum (IncomeVerification_enum) describing income verification status (Pending, Verified, Failed).
credit|employment_and_income|incstabscor: A REAL score of how stable the income is (e.g., '7.5').
credit|employment_and_income|addincomesr: An enum (AdditionalIncomeSource_enum) for source of additional income (Investment, Rental, Part-time).
credit|employment_and_income|hshincome: A DECIMAL(12,2) capturing total household income (e.g., '90000.00').
credit|employment_and_income|emplstable: A SMALLINT rating how stable the employment is (e.g., '4').
credit|employment_and_income|indrisklvl: An enum (Risk3_enum) indicating industry risk (Low, Medium, High).
credit|employment_and_income|occrisklvl: An enum (Risk3_enum) indicating occupation risk (Low, Medium, High).
credit|employment_and_income|incsrcrisk: An enum (Risk3_enum) for income source risk (Low, Medium, High).
credit|employment_and_income|georisk: An enum (Risk3_enum) for geographic risk (Low, Medium, High).
credit|employment_and_income|demrisk: An enum (Risk3_enum) capturing demographic risk (Low, Medium, High).
credit|employment_and_income|edulevel: An enum (EducationLevel_enum) labeling education (Doctorate, High School, Master, Bachelor).
credit|expenses_and_assets|expemplref: A VARCHAR(20) primary key referencing employment_and_income(EmplCoreRef).
credit|expenses_and_assets|fixexpratio: A DECIMAL(5,4) ratio for fixed expenses (e.g., '0.3000').
credit|expenses_and_assets|discexpratio: A DECIMAL(5,4) ratio for discretionary expenses (e.g., '0.1500').
credit|expenses_and_assets|vehown: An enum (VehicleOwnership_enum) for vehicle ownership (Lease, Own).
credit|expenses_and_assets|bankacccount: A SMALLINT storing how many bank accounts are held (e.g., '2').
credit|expenses_and_assets|bankaccage: A SMALLINT showing age in years of the oldest bank account (e.g., '5').
credit|expenses_and_assets|bankaccbal: A DECIMAL(14,2) representing total bank account balances (e.g., '5000.00').
credit|bank_and_transactions|bankexpref: A VARCHAR(20) primary key referencing expenses_and_assets(ExpEmplRef).
credit|bank_and_transactions|banktxfreq: An enum (BankTransactionFrequency_enum) describing transaction frequency (Low, Medium, High).
credit|bank_and_transactions|banktxamt: A DECIMAL(14,2) typical monthly transaction amount (e.g., '3000.00').
credit|bank_and_transactions|bankrelscor: A NUMERIC(4,3) measuring the strength of the bank relationship (e.g., '0.850').
credit|bank_and_transactions|ovrfreq: An enum (OverdraftFrequency_enum) capturing overdraft occurrences (Frequent, Occasional, Rare, Never).
credit|bank_and_transactions|bouncecount: A SMALLINT for how many checks or payments have bounced (e.g., '1').
credit|bank_and_transactions|inscoverage: An enum (InsuranceCoverage_enum) for coverage level (Comprehensive, Basic).
credit|bank_and_transactions|lifeinsval: A DECIMAL(14,2) denoting total life insurance value (e.g., '50000.00').
credit|bank_and_transactions|hlthinsstat: An enum (HealthInsuranceStatus_enum) capturing health insurance (Basic, Premium).
credit|bank_and_transactions|fraudrisk: A DECIMAL(5,3) rating potential fraud risk (e.g., '0.120').
credit|bank_and_transactions|idverscore: A DECIMAL(5,3) indicating identity verification confidence (e.g., '0.890').
credit|bank_and_transactions|docverstat: An enum (DocumentVerificationStatus_enum) describing document checks (Pending, Verified, Failed).
credit|bank_and_transactions|kycstat: An enum (KYCStatus_enum) capturing KYC outcome (Pending, Failed, Completed).
credit|bank_and_transactions|amlresult: An enum (AMLScreeningResult_enum) storing AML screening result (Flag, Pass, Fail).
credit|credit_and_compliance|compbankref: A VARCHAR(20) primary key referencing bank_and_transactions(BankExpRef).
credit|credit_and_compliance|sancresult: An enum (SanctionsScreeningResult_enum) for sanctions screening (Fail, Flag, Pass).
credit|credit_and_compliance|pepresult: An enum (PEPScreeningResult_enum) for PEP screening (Flag, Pass, Fail).
credit|credit_and_compliance|legalstat: An enum (LegalStatus_enum) describing legal status (Clear, Under Review, Restricted).
credit|credit_and_compliance|credscore: A SMALLINT holding the credit score (e.g., '720').
credit|credit_and_compliance|risklev: An enum (RiskLevel_enum) denoting risk level (Low, Medium, High, Very High).
credit|credit_and_compliance|defhist: An enum (PaymentHistory_enum) indicating default history. Possible values: Poor, Fair, Good, Excellent, Current, Past.
credit|credit_and_compliance|collacc: An INTEGER representing how many collection accounts (e.g., '0').
credit|credit_and_compliance|choffs: A SMALLINT for number of charge-offs (e.g., '1').
credit|credit_and_compliance|bankr: A SMALLINT indicating how many bankruptcies (e.g., '0').
credit|credit_and_compliance|taxlien: A SMALLINT for any tax liens (e.g., '0').
credit|credit_and_compliance|credinq: A SMALLINT for total credit inquiries (e.g., '3').
credit|credit_and_compliance|credrepdisp: A VARCHAR(50) capturing credit report disputes or notes (e.g., '2 disputes').
credit|credit_and_compliance|credageyrs: A SMALLINT storing how many years of credit history (e.g., '10').
credit|credit_and_compliance|oldaccage: A SMALLINT age in years of the oldest account (e.g., '15').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|histc: A VARCHAR(20) primary key referencing credit_and_compliance(CompBankRef).
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|newac: A SMALLINT for the newest account age in years (e.g., '1').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|avgac: A NUMERIC(4,1) for average account age (e.g., '4.5').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|credl: A NUMERIC(4,3) ratio of used to available credit limit (e.g., '0.350').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|payco: A NUMERIC(4,3) capturing how consistent payments are (e.g., '0.900').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|recen: An enum (RecentCreditBehavior_enum) describing recent credit behavior (Stable, Improving, Deteriorating).
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|seekb: An enum (CreditSeekingBehavior_enum) for seeking new credit (High, Medium, Low).
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|cardc: A SMALLINT counting how many credit cards the user has (e.g., '2').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|totcr: A DECIMAL(14,2) indicating total credit limit (e.g., '15000.00').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|credu: A DECIMAL(5,3) capturing overall credit utilization (e.g., '0.350').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|cardp: An enum (PaymentHistory_enum) describing credit card payment history. Possible values: Poor, Fair, Good, Excellent, Current, Past.
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|loanc: A SMALLINT counting how many loan accounts exist (e.g., '2').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|activ: A SMALLINT indicating how many loans are active (e.g., '1').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|totlo: A BIGINT for total loan amount (e.g., '80000').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|loanp: An enum (PaymentHistory_enum) storing loan payment history. Possible values: Poor, Fair, Good, Excellent, Current, Past.
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|custs: A SMALLINT for the number of customer service interactions (e.g., '2').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|compl: An enum (ComplaintHistory_enum) labeling complaint history (Low, Medium, High).
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|produ: A NUMERIC(5,3) measuring how many financial products are used (e.g., '0.550').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|chanu: A NUMERIC(5,3) capturing channel usage diversity (e.g., '0.780').
credit|credit_accounts_and_history|custl: A DECIMAL(14,2) for the customer’s lifetime value (e.g., '12000.00').

credit|expenses_and_assets|propfinancial.column_meaning: JSONB column. Bundles all housing‑related facts (ownership, value, and pay history) so risk or marketing rules need only one JSONB lookup.

fields_meaning.propown: An enum (PropertyOwnership_enum) describing property ownership (Rent, Living with Parents, Own).
fields_meaning.proptype: An enum (PropertyType_enum) for property classification (Apartment, House, Condo).

mortgagebits.mortbalance: A DECIMAL(15,2) storing current mortgage balance (e.g., '150000.00').
mortgagebits.mortpayhist: An enum (PaymentHistory_enum) for mortgage payment history. Possible values: Poor, Fair, Good, Excellent, Current, Past.

fields_meaning.rentpayhist: An enum (PaymentHistory_enum) for rent payment history. Possible values: Poor, Fair, Good, Excellent, Current, Past.

credit|bank_and_transactions|chaninvdata.column_meaning: JSONB column. Packs together digital‑channel habits and investment/trading style flags for engagement and cross‑sell scoring.

fields_meaning.onlineuse: An enum (OnlineBankingUsage_enum) describing online banking use (High, Medium, Low).
fields_meaning.mobileuse: An enum (MobileBankingUsage_enum) describing mobile banking usage (High, Medium, Low).
fields_meaning.autopay: An enum (YesNo_enum) indicating if automatic payments are active (Yes, No).
fields_meaning.depostat: An enum (YesNo_enum) indicating direct deposit usage (Yes, No).

invcluster.investport: An enum (InvestmentPortfolio_enum) labeling investment portfolio style (Conservative, Moderate, Aggressive).
invcluster.investexp: An enum (InvestmentExperience_enum) capturing investing experience (Extensive, Moderate, Limited).
invcluster.tradeact: An enum (TradingActivity_enum) describing trading activity (High, Medium, Low).
